newsitem.title: USA: GOLF-SCORES AT WORLD SERIES OF GOLF.
newsitem.headline: GOLF-SCORES AT WORLD SERIES OF GOLF.

text.p: million NEC World Series of Golf after the first round
Thursday at the 7,149 yard, par 70 Firestone C.C course
66 Paul Goydos, Billy Mayfair, Hidemichi Tanaka (Japan)
70 Tim Herron, Duffy Waldorf, Davis Love, Anders Forsbrand
(Sweden), Nick Faldo (Britain), John Cook, Steve Jones, Phil
72 Clarence Rose, Loren Roberts, Fred Funk, Sven Struver
(Germany), Alexander Cejka (Germany), Hal Sutton, Tom Lehman
73 D.A. Weibring, Brad Bryant, Craig Parry (Australia),
Stewart Ginn (Australia), Corey Pavin, Craig Stadler, Mark
75 Jim Furyk, Satoshi Higashi (Japan), Willie Wood, Shigeki
